Sentencas: A high performance electrochemical reactor for the partial oxidation of CH4 into synthesis gas has been developed by fixing powder catalysts on the anode surface for the natural gas conversion.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane to synthesis gas using Ni/Ca0.8Sr0.2TiO3 anode catalyst

Sentencas: A powdered catalyst of Ni,Ni-1.0/Ca0.8Sr0.2TiO3, fixed by a gold paste has excellent catalytic activity without significant deactivation by the carbon deposition.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane to synthesis gas using Ni/Ca0.8Sr0.2TiO3 anode catalyst

Sentencas: The conversion of CH4 at 1173K is 38.8% with the selectivity to CO of 98.9%.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane to synthesis gas using Ni/Ca0.8Sr0.2TiO3 anode catalyst

Sentencas: The advantage of this system is the separation of N-2 and O-2 in the cathode chamber when using air as the oxidant gas instead of pure oxygen.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane to synthesis gas using Ni/Ca0.8Sr0.2TiO3 anode catalyst

Sentencas: Furthermore, an electric power density of 14.5 mW cm(-2) has been obtained by this system at 1173 K.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane to synthesis gas using Ni/Ca0.8Sr0.2TiO3 anode catalyst

Sentencas: The amount of carbon deposition over the Ni-1.0/Ca0.8Sr0.2TiO3 is ten times lower than that over the Niyttria-stabilized zirconia cermet of a typical anode material in the solid oxide fuel cell system or the typical Ni/Al2O3 catalyst for CH, conversion.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane to synthesis gas using Ni/Ca0.8Sr0.2TiO3 anode catalyst

Sentencas: This is attributed to the oxidation of carbon deposits by the lattice oxygen species that migrated from the oxide to the NiCa0.8Sr0.2TiO3 boundary.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane to synthesis gas using Ni/Ca0.8Sr0.2TiO3 anode catalyst

Sentencas: The synthesis gas is considered to be formed not only by the steam reforming of CH, including the complete oxidation but also by the direct oxidation of CH4.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane to synthesis gas using Ni/Ca0.8Sr0.2TiO3 anode catalyst
